trans-unit.source: Provides data for an event that is raised by calling the <xref:System.Web.SiteMapProvider.CurrentNode*> property of the <xref href="System.Web.SiteMapProvider"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 提供藉由呼叫引發事件的資料<xref:System.Web.SiteMapProvider.CurrentNode*>屬性<xref href="System.Web.SiteMapProvider"></xref>類別</xref:System.Web.SiteMapProvider.CurrentNode*>

trans-unit.source: The SiteMapResolveEventArgs class is used in the <xref:System.Web.SiteMapProvider.ResolveSiteMapNode%2A> method to enable subscribers to the <xref:System.Web.SiteMapProvider.SiteMapResolve> event to return an instance of the <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode> class.
trans-unit.target: SiteMapResolveEventArgs 類別會用於<xref:System.Web.SiteMapProvider.ResolveSiteMapNode%2A>啟用訂閱者，<xref:System.Web.SiteMapProvider.SiteMapResolve>以傳回<xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode>類別</xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode>的執行個體的事件</xref:System.Web.SiteMapProvider.SiteMapResolve>的方法</xref:System.Web.SiteMapProvider.ResolveSiteMapNode%2A>

trans-unit.source: By adding an event handler delegate to handle the <xref:System.Web.SiteMapProvider.SiteMapResolve> event, you can create a <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode> representation of a page without implementing a custom site map provider.
trans-unit.target: 加入事件處理常式委派以處理<xref:System.Web.SiteMapProvider.SiteMapResolve>事件，您可以建立<xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode>頁面而不實作自訂站台對應提供者表示法。</xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode> </xref:System.Web.SiteMapProvider.SiteMapResolve>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.SiteMapResolveEventArgs"></xref> class using the specified <xref href="System.Web.HttpContext"></xref> and <xref href="System.Web.SiteMapProvider"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Web.SiteMapResolveEventArgs"></xref>類別使用指定<xref href="System.Web.HttpContext"></xref>和<xref href="System.Web.SiteMapProvider"></xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: Both the `context` and `provider` parameters might be `null`.
The <xref:System.Web.XmlSiteMapProvider> object initializes a new instance of the <xref:System.Web.SiteMapResolveEventArgs> class with values that are not `null`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.XmlSiteMapProvider>物件初始化的新執行個體<xref:System.Web.SiteMapResolveEventArgs>類別的值與`null`。</xref:System.Web.SiteMapResolveEventArgs> </xref:System.Web.XmlSiteMapProvider>

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Web.HttpContext"></xref> that represents the context of the current page request.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Web.HttpContext"> </xref> ，代表目前的頁面要求的內容。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.SiteMapProvider"></xref> that raised the <xref href="System.Web.SiteMapProvider.SiteMapResolve"></xref> event.
Gets the context of the page request that the requested node represents.
trans-unit.target: 取得要求的節點所代表的頁面要求的內容。

trans-unit.source: Event subscribers can use the <xref:System.Web.HttpContext> and <xref:System.Web.SiteMapProvider> objects to dynamically create a <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode> object and retrieve information about the requested page, such as the requested URL, as well as user information.
trans-unit.target: 事件訂閱者可以使用<xref:System.Web.HttpContext>和<xref:System.Web.SiteMapProvider>動態建立物件<xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode>物件並擷取要求的網頁，要求的 URL，例如的相關資訊，以及使用者資訊。</xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode> </xref:System.Web.SiteMapProvider> </xref:System.Web.HttpContext>

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Web.HttpContext"></xref>, if one is specified; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Web.HttpContext"> </xref>，如果有指定，否則<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Web.SiteMapProvider"></xref> object that raised the <xref href="System.Web.SiteMapProvider.SiteMapResolve"></xref> event.

Event subscribers can use the <xref:System.Web.HttpContext> and <xref:System.Web.SiteMapProvider> objects to dynamically create a <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode> object and retrieve information about the requested page, such as the requested URL, as well as user information.
trans-unit.target: 事件訂閱者可以使用<xref:System.Web.HttpContext>和<xref:System.Web.SiteMapProvider>動態建立物件<xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode>物件並擷取要求的網頁，要求的 URL，例如的相關資訊，以及使用者資訊。</xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode> </xref:System.Web.SiteMapProvider> </xref:System.Web.HttpContext>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.SiteMapProvider"></xref> that raised the event; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>, if no provider is specified during the <xref uid="langword_csharp_EventArgs" name="EventArgs" href=""></xref> object construction.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Web.SiteMapProvider"> </xref>引發事件，否則<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>，如果沒有提供者期間指定了<xref uid="langword_csharp_EventArgs" name="EventArgs" href=""></xref>物件建構。
